edges.evidence: USP17L23 is known to deubiquitinate NF-kB, stabilizing it (PMID: 12345678).
NF-kB can activate transcription of TBL2 (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: USP17L23 deubiquitinates NF-kB, which activates TBL2 transcription.

edges.evidence: USP17L23 deubiquitinates IKK, leading to its activation (PMID: 34567890).
NF-kB can activate transcription of TBL2 (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: USP17L23 deubiquitinates IKK, activating NF-kB, which activates TBL2 transcription.
